EmailTemplate.subject: SCHEDULE TODAY: BendixKing AeroVue Flight Demo
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]> Last chance to sign up for the AeroVue flight demo in Fredericksburg, Texas (T82)
Event Name: King Air Gathering IV <[[http://www.kingairgathering.com/]]>
Date: September 26-29, 2019
Sign up now to fly the BendixKing AeroVue Integrated Flight Deck <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aerovue]]> at the King Air Gathering this week in Fredericksburg (T82). Last chance to sign up before the event; donâ€™t delay!
SIGN UP NOW! <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/AeroVue_BK_201903.html]]>
